text: Xo mnusʹy xey! Phwk cea cng raluk thung khwam pordpran khx ngxallxhˌ thi mi tx phwk cea ca mi phra phu srang xun dı ca kxallxhˌ kranan hrux thi ca prathan paccay yangchiph kæ phwk cea cak fak fa læa phændin mimi phracea xun dı nxkcak phraxngkh dangnan thami lea phwk cea cung thuk hlxklwng hı han hang xxk pi (cak khwam cring)
